summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Second Avenue from a point (120) One hundred twenty feet North of Cedar Street to Denny Way in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 13839, creating Local Improvement District No. 1259 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
